participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nostalgic and imaginative, she often reflects on her past while yearning for adventure. Despite her frustrations, she has a playful side.
participant_1.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i am a 56 year old woman.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Curious and rebellious, she often feels misunderstood and dreams of a world where she can escape the confines of school.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i hate school. i love to play pobox. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

content.text: Don’t you want to talk to me?
Sorry, you don’t seem to be ready to talk, bye.
